sentences.sContent: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.sCn: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.sContent: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.sCn: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

remMethod.val: de(向下)+crease (增长，产生)→负增长→减少，减小； 和increase (n./v. 增加) 一起记

trans.tranOther: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
